api_list.api_description: Estimate the age of a person based on their first name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The first name to estimate age for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256). Defaults to None, which returns the default size (usually 16x16).

query: How old is someone likely to be if their first name is Michael, and can you show me the favicon for dev.to?
